name: Sorcerer's Gambit
description:
Welcome Mages!

To Sorcerer's Gambit! the game of monster slaying. The game features a unique boss generating system and fantastic fantasy art-style.

With the bosses becoming more difficult every time you kill one, this is sure to keep you occupied!

- Dapper Mallard Studios

*Dapper Mallard Studios is not responsible for death by (Impaling, Incineration, Tentacles, Lasers, etc...)*
